title: Arranged Team Chat Fix
body:
One thing that's a little annoying is when you're with a group of friends in premade and you're chatting, mid way through typing the leader starts queue, and everything that you wrote is completely gone.

Another annoying feature is that if you're in queue and a game is found the chat completely vanishes even if you were reading something you didnt get to.

Can you make a chat that does not disappear until you get into game, that way the conversation can continue even as people dodge or not press okay, because to be honest, that happens a lot.
